Help:Node.title: offer
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: $(keyword) [item] to [person], $(keyword) [person] [item]
EXAMPLE: $(keyword) sword to guard, $(keyword) guard my sword
Offers an item to a person; if the person "accepts" the item from you, it will be taken.
To see what items you are currently offering, type: offer
If you have been offered an item and want to take it, type: accept [item]
SEE ALSO: , ,
